# Requirements Checklist: View Conference Registration Prices (UC-02)

**Purpose**: QA-facing unit tests for requirements clarity and completeness for UC-02.
**Created**: 2026-02-08
**Feature**: /Users/mkodi/Documents/University/Year 5/ECE 493/Lab 2/ECE493Lab2/specs/002-view-registration-prices/spec.md

**Note**: This checklist is generated by the `/speckit.checklist` command based on feature context and requirements.

## Requirement Completeness

- [ ] CHK001 Are all UC-02 flow outcomes covered (main + three alternates)? [Completeness, Spec §User Scenarios & Testing]
- [ ] CHK002 Are attendance types explicitly required in the displayed pricing? [Completeness, Spec §FR-002]
- [ ] CHK003 Is the “no pricing data” user message requirement fully specified (including no misleading pricing)? [Completeness, Spec §FR-003]

## Requirement Clarity

- [ ] CHK004 Is “temporary system issue” message meaning/criteria defined? [Clarity, Ambiguity, Spec §FR-004]
- [ ] CHK005 Is “partial pricing information” defined with observable criteria? [Clarity, Ambiguity, Spec §FR-005]
- [ ] CHK006 Is “complete registration price list” defined with objective inclusion rules? [Clarity, Ambiguity, Spec §FR-002]

## Requirement Consistency

- [ ] CHK007 Are guest access requirements consistent across scenarios and security section? [Consistency, Spec §User Scenarios & Testing, §FR-001, §Security]

## Acceptance Criteria Quality

- [ ] CHK008 Are success criteria measurable and mapped to all AT-UC02-* tests? [Acceptance Criteria, Spec §Success Criteria]

## Scenario Coverage

- [ ] CHK009 Are requirements explicitly stated for each alternate flow (no data, retrieval error, partial)? [Coverage, Spec §FR-003–FR-005]

## Edge Case Coverage

- [ ] CHK010 Are edge cases explicitly listed and aligned to UC-02 extensions? [Coverage, Spec §Edge Cases]

## Non-Functional Requirements

- [ ] CHK011 Are accessibility requirements for pricing display specified or explicitly out of scope? [Gap]
- [ ] CHK012 Are performance or availability expectations specified or explicitly out of scope? [Gap]

## Dependencies & Assumptions

- [ ] CHK013 Are assumptions about pricing format and guest access explicitly validated? [Assumption, Spec §Assumptions]
- [ ] CHK014 Are dependencies on CMS availability and pricing data states clearly documented? [Dependency, Spec §Dependencies]

## Ambiguities & Conflicts

- [ ] CHK015 Are terms like “complete,” “partial,” and “misleading” unambiguously defined? [Ambiguity, Spec §FR-002–FR-005]
